org.jasig.cas.authentication

Class DefaultAuthenticationContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.authentication.DefaultAuthenticationContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AuthenticationContext

    public final class DefaultAuthenticationContext
extends java.lang.Object
implements AuthenticationContext
    The DefaultAuthenticationContext represents a concrete implementation of the authentication context. It acts as a carrier to hold authentication sessions established during the processing of a given request, and identifies which of those sessions can be considered the primary.
    Since:
    4.2

      • getService

        public Service getService()
        Description copied from interface: AuthenticationContext
        Gets the service for which this authentication context is relevant. The service MAY be null, as an authentication context in CAS can be established without providing a service/destination.
        Specified by:
        getService in interface AuthenticationContext
